product_name: La Roche-PosayPure Vitamin C Anti-Wrinkle Firming Eye Cream
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsLa Roche-Posay Pure Vitamin C Anti-Wrinkle Eye Cream with hyaluronic acid enhances the feeling of skin firmness while reducing the look of crow's feet and wrinkles.
details: DetailsBenefitsVitamin C firming eye cream visibly plumps skinHydrates with hyaluronic acid to reduce the appearance of crow's feet and wrinkles while enhancing the feeling of skin firmnessEye cream with vitamin C promotes even-looking skin and reduces visible rednessNon-greasy, velvety firming eye cream texture provides an instant blurring effectSoothes sensitive skin and provides antioxidant benefits with mineral-rich La-Roche Posay Thermal Spring WaterSuitable for sensitive skin and sensitive eyesNon-comedogenicDermatologist, ophthalmologist and allergy testedKey Ingredients10% pure vitamin C is a potent antioxidant with anti-aging and skin-brightening capabilitiesHyaluronic acid hydrates and plumps the skinNeurosensine helps reduce signs of skin sensitivityLa Roche-Posay Thermal Spring Water is naturally rich in minerals with scientifically demonstrated soothing and antioxidant propertiesFormulated WithoutFragranceParabensItem 2574393How To UseApply in the morning and/or evening, massage from the inner corner of the eye outward. Can be used in combination with Redermic R Eyes. Apply Redermic C Eyes in the morning and Redermic R Eyes at night.IngredientsAqua / Water, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter / Shea Butter, Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil / Meadowfoam Seed Oil, Ascorbic Acid, Mannose, Butylene Glycol, Paraffinum Liquidum / Mineral Oil, Ammonium Polyacryldimethyltauramide / Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Cetyl Alcohol, Peg-100 Stearate, Glyceryl Stearate, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Potassium Hydroxide, Paraffin, Sodium Styrene/Ma Copolymer, Cera Microcristallina / Microcrystalline Wax, Madecassoside, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Dimethiconol, Disodium Edta, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Caprylyl Glycol, Acetyl Dipeptide-1 Cetyl Ester, Xanthan Gum, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Phenoxyethanol.
how_to_use: Apply in the morning and/or evening, massage from the inner corner of the eye outward. Can be used in combination with Redermic R Eyes. Apply Redermic C Eyes in the morning and Redermic R Eyes at night.
ingredients: Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil / Meadowfoam Seed Oil

reviews.headline: Product itself is great - the packaging not so much.
reviews.comments: When I received it - the top was broken off.  So I've been using saran wrap to cover the top as the top will not screw back on. I like the actual product but think they need to fix the mechanics a bit.

reviews.headline: REDESIGN THE TUBE & CAP
reviews.comments: This could actually be good product to use, but because the tube and cap when trying to close waste the product… Do not waste your money on this until they change this defect!!!

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: It is just the right consistency and hydrates well. We will see if it helps with dark circles. So far I like it. Good under makeup

reviews.headline: La Roche Posey never fails.
reviews.comments: La Roche Posey is the best product I have found for super sensitive skin and eczema flair ups. This product leaves my eyes looking alert and bright! No negative reaction.

reviews.headline: Goes on well
reviews.comments: Eye serum feels good. I only had for a few days,  so can't say how well it works

reviews.headline: Substantiate your eye moisturizer....
reviews.comments: This products is incredibly affordable and gentle for a Vitamin C eye cream.  Though it is not brightening, nor firming in my opinion, but it smooths the lower orbital very well, provides all the necessary moisture for those you need deep, hydrating moisture and NOT de-puffing, while giving the best Vitamin C/Vitamin E combination and is shea butter enriched.  If used in a Korean Regimen, this product can be layered.

reviews.headline: I use it everyday
reviews.comments: I love this eye cream. it absorbs well on the skin but don't apply it too close to your eyeballs cause it does cause a little of stinging.

reviews.headline: No results
reviews.comments: I did not see any benefits with this eye cream. It does absorb quickly which is nice. Beyond that, it didn't improve texture, color, puffiness. My main issue is puffiness and slight darkness. I was hoping adding a vitamin cream would help with color and the thin eye skin as so many experts advise. I just didn't see results

reviews.headline: Oxidized on my skin
reviews.comments: I like a lot of products from this brand but this one did NOT work for me. It didn't soak into my skin and just oxidized and turned yellow, making it look like I had bruises under my eyes. I also found the packaging confusing.

reviews.headline: Dryness
reviews.comments: I have been using am & pm for a two months. No major improvements and no moisture. :( I have dryness problem right know. I think I will need for different eye creams.

reviews.headline: smooth vitamin C
reviews.comments: every other night and everyday to moisturize and brighten my eyes

reviews.headline: Product unsealed
reviews.comments: I bought this product online. Product arrived unsealed. I had to go the store and return it since this product was only available online. Very disappointed!

reviews.headline: This product is amazing
reviews.comments: I have extremely sensitive skin. This is the only line of skin care I can use. After a few uses I have seen results already

reviews.headline: Redermic
reviews.comments: Unfortunately did not work for me.  Skin became very greasy...☹️

reviews.headline: Highly Recommend
reviews.comments: Softens and reduces wrinkles while effectively moisturizing under eye area.

reviews.headline: Happy with this product
reviews.comments: Use it in the morning before makeup and in the evening before bed

reviews.headline: I'm hooked
reviews.comments: La Roche-Posay is an incredible line.  I use all the (R) and (C) I have seen the difference in few weeks and felt the difference in the mornings after treatment at night.  Great price. Great Brand.  Sensitive skin and have not once had an issue.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again
reviews.comments: I've been using this product for the past couple of weeks and it's the best eye cream I've tried in the last year. it really does firm the areas around the eyes. My husband has also noticed the firmness in my skin. It doesn't irritate your eyes or burn the area around the eyes.

reviews.headline: Awesome!
reviews.comments: I e used it for a week and it has diminished my wrinkles and made my eyes look brighter.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments:
For the cost of this product I had hoped that there would be some noticeable difference in the texture around my eyes, but there really wasn't.  The other thing I wasn't too impressed with was the fact that it didn't blend well with my foundations.  I've used it with a couple different brands and it sorted balled up.  I applied the vit-C cream 30 minutes before applying the foundation so it had plenty of time to soak...  I also applied the cream with a light hand.  
I will go back to my other brand of eye cream once this is used up.  In my opinion, not worth the cost.

display_values: Great for sensitive eyes or dry eyes

media.headline: Best eye lift on the market
media.caption: Bad hair, good skin!

media.headline: Moisturizing and Helps with Dark Circles
media.caption: Smooths Fine Lines

media.headline: Good eyes cream for night time
media.caption: My eyes wrinkles

faceoff_positive.comments: This eye cream is absolutely sensational for helping me combat the signs of aging. It truly transforms the look of the skin beneath my eyes. It gives the texture of the skin a glowing, translucent effect. It also has a moisturizing effect that fills in the wrinkles so they become so unnoticeable that they look practically non-existent. This eye cream is definitely my ammunition for combating aging. I make sure to never run out of this as no other eye cream can replace it and I have tried many throughout the years. This one is truly remarkable and should be given an award for its amazing anti-aging benefits!
faceoff_positive.headline: Extraordinary Product, Simply The Best Eye Cream

faceoff_negative.comments:
the product feels great on my eyes, however, the cap makes it hard to close and I have wasted so much product already trying to close the bottle. 

Not practical at all & will not be purchasing again unless they change the cap.
faceoff_negative.headline: Poor Bottle Manufacturing

rollup.name: Pure Vitamin C Anti-Wrinkle Firming Eye Cream
